pageContext.claim: “Fake News [referring to reports that Trump suggested border officials shoot migrants in the legs to slow them down], just like the snakes and gators in the moat. The Media is deranged, they have lost their minds!”
pageContext.analysis: These reports were accurate and confirmed by several administration officials. The New York Times and Washington Post independently of each other reported that Trump suggested border officials shoot migrants in the legs to slow them down. The Times reported on his plan to have moats with alligators and snakes.
